explanation: [0-0] On a dry patch of land, a lioness lies on the ground on the right side, mouth agape, eyes looking forward. Two cubs lie on either side of the lioness. On the left side, a male lion lies on the ground, one cub standing on its back and another at its tail. Green grass is visible in the distance.

[0-7] Next, a cub approaches the male lion, trying to get its attention. The male lion raises its head, looks at the cub, and opens its mouth wide. Then a cub climbs onto the male lion's back and starts to play with it. The male lion tries to stand up, but the cub clings tightly to it. The male lion then pulls the cub on its back into its arms and continues to lie on the ground, playing with the cub. The other two cubs watch their interaction.

[7-13] Subsequently, a cub bites the male lion's tail, trying to pull it up. A cub steps over the male lion, comes to its back, and rests a front leg on the lion's back, snuggling up to its side. It then puts its front leg down and looks at the male lion.
